content.text: To redesign the website for an electrical equipment manufacturer.
The project was made while working at Jetstyle. A new design was created with the help of the client’s art director and product managers.
This design was not developed, because the client decided to change the contractor.
Cases and strategic directions of the company are highlighted on the front page. The product is demonstrated as a slider with renders and pictures.
The catalogue was developed with the idea in mind, that some products might not have a picture.

On the top of the page there are user-friendly big buttons for ordering a consultation or downloading the documents. On the left is placed the navigating menu on the description of a product, so that a customer can access any section needed in one single click.
On the page of the case there are specially developed statistics blocks of the project and reviews. They help to cut the narrative and highlight the main points.
We redesigned all the pages and the mobile version of the website.
